donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
1. HIV related policies and legislation are improved at the national and local levels to ensure human rights based- approach and gender equality principles, overcoming stigma and discrimination. HIV issues are mainstreamed into national development strategies, sectoral and local plans.
2. Key actors involved in multisectoral response to HIV apply human rights-based approach, gender equality principles, leadership, strategic planning, partnership building and youth protection

project_descr: The programme supports the Government in strengthening the contributions of relevant actors to human development dimension of the national HIV response.
project_title: Support to the Government to Respond to HIV
